name: Barghest
description: A wolf-like fiend that devours souls to grow stronger. Often found serving greater evils or seeking to manipulate goblinoid tribes.

name: Vrock
description: A vulture-headed demon that delights in carnage and spreading madness through screeches and spores.

name: Skeleton Champion
description: An undead warrior risen from an ancient battlefield, mindlessly following its last command.

name: Torla Ironhand
description: A dwarven blacksmith who helps adventurers repair their gear and provides sage advice from a life well-lived.

name: Sylrielle of the Glade
description: A woodland druid who protects sacred groves and communes with spirits of the forest.

name: Jareth the Informant
description: A shady contact with ties to various thieves' guilds. Can be helpful... for a price.
